item.title: About me
item.author: pb.ismael@gmail.com
item.description:
Hi!,

I’m Isma. I have been doing stuff with code and people since 19981.

I started in this job developing apps for the Pick Operating System, and that was the starting point of a fun story that has seen me acting as a backend developer, sysadmin and frontend developer.

I consider myself a software developer, but I have found myself leading projects and teams in quite complex environments, and I found joy in doing that too.

In the last 5 years I have been moving more and more towards front-end projects and I am currently leading the front end development team in QMetric.

  1. although my first Logo programming course happened back in 1986… [return]
